network.hostname: your external IP or domain name here
remoteWhitelist: IP or host of the service that will be interacting with your node, e.g. SAP server, a Dapp accessing the DKG, data pipeline service etc

initial_deposit_amount: your initial deposit amount in TRAC with 18 decimals, 1 TRAC = 1000000000000000000

implementations.rpc_server_url: url to your RPC server i.e. Infura or own Geth server
implementations.node_private_key: your ethereum wallet's private key here
implementations.management_wallet: your ethereum management wallet public key here

implementations.management_wallet: your xdai management wallet public key here
